<title level="1" pfs="Limited">[Grave Robber](/NPCs.aspx?ID=886)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

Many cultures have a tradition of burying their dead with a selection of the deceased's most precious possessions, and some include gifts that are thought to provide a boon in the afterlife. Such valuables can be easy pickings for those with no respect for—or fear of—the dead.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Humanoid](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14)): DC 15

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 13

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 10
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Gamemastery Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=22) pg. 208</row>

**Perception** +5

**Languages**
[Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1)

**Skills**
[Crafting](/Skills.aspx?ID=4) +6, [Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=5) +2, [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) +2, [Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14) +6, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +5, [Underworld Lore](/Skills.aspx?ID=8) +6

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +1

**Dex** +2

**Con** +2

**Int** +3

**Wis** +2

**Cha** -1
</row>

**Infused Items** A grave robber carries the following infused items: 2 [lesser bottled lightnings](/Equipment.aspx?ID=76), a [lesser frost vial](/Equipment.aspx?ID=77), and a [lesser thunderstone](/Equipment.aspx?ID=79). These items last for 24 hours, or until the next time the grave robber makes their daily preparations.

**Items**
[Alchemist's Tools](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2), [Dagger](/Weapons.aspx?ID=3), [formula book](/Equipment.aspx?ID=22), [Holy Water](/Equipment.aspx?ID=245), [shovel](/Equipment.aspx?ID=59), [Studded Leather Armor](/Armor.aspx?ID=5)

</column>
